Class LiveJournalSyndicationExtensionContext

Encapsulates specific information about an individual LiveJournalSyndicationExtension.

Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source

IsPreformatted

Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets a value indicating if the author has requested that the entry HTML be displayed without modification.

Declaration
public bool IsPreformatted { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

true if the author has requested that the entry HTML be displayed without modification; otherwise false.
Remarks

If false, newlines within the entry must be expanded into visual newlines (using the br tag) to be displayed properly.

public LiveJournalMood Mood { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
LiveJournalMood

A LiveJournalMood object that represents the current mood.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Music

Gets or sets the current music.

Declaration
public string Music { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Textual or entity encoded content that represents the current music.
Remarks

There is no standard format for presenting broken-down information such as artist or album.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Security

Gets or sets the access level.

Declaration
public LiveJournalSecurity Security { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
LiveJournalSecurity

A LiveJournalSecurity object that represents the access level.
Remarks

If absent, the entry is assumed to be Public accessible. All feeds requested without authentication will only contain public entries.

| Improve this Doc View Source

UserPicture

Gets or sets theassociated user picture.

Declaration
public LiveJournalUserPicture UserPicture { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
LiveJournalUserPicture

A LiveJournalUserPicture object that represents the associated user picture.
Remarks

If omitted, the LiveJournal entry uses the feed-level default picture.

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

Load(XPathNavigator, XmlNamespaceManager)

Initializes the syndication extension context using the supplied System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.

Declaration
public bool Load(XPathNavigator source, XmlNamespaceManager manager)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator source

The XPathNavigator used to load this LiveJournalSyndicationExtensionContext.
System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager manager

The System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager object used to resolve prefixed syndication extension elements and attributes.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

true if the LiveJournalSyndicationExtensionContext was able to be initialized using the supplied source; otherwise false.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The manager is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
| Improve this Doc View Source

WriteTo(XmlWriter, String)

Writes the current context to the specified System.Xml.XmlWriter.

Declaration
public void WriteTo(XmlWriter writer, string xmlNamespace)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XmlWriter writer

The XmlWriter to which you want to write the current context.
System.String xmlNamespace

The XML namespace used to qualify prefixed syndication extension elements and attributes.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The writer is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The xmlNamespace is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The xmlNamespace is an empty string.
